title: No Winter Urf This Year!??!?!?!?!?!?
body: "Nexus Blitz is back for another test run this Snowdown! Stay tuned for more information on when this experimental mode will be available to play." DOES THIS MEAN NO WINTER URF?!!??!?!?! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Remember rotating game modes?



Pepperidge farm remembers
Update: still no nexus blitz or URF. Riot is slacking majorly.

> [{quoted}](name=Applepieohmy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EFJ4X9gU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-12-05T23:43:31.683+0000)
>
> Update: still no nexus blitz or URF. Riot is slacking majorly.

Nexus Blitz is being activated on the 7th i think, or something like that.
It should be URF. People who say URF isn't fun don't have to play it. its really simple.

> [{quoted}](name=Applepieohmy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EFJ4X9gU,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-12-06T00:09:42.431+0000)
>
> It should be URF. People who say URF isn't fun don't have to play it. its really simple.

And people who say Nexus Blitz isn't fun don't have to play it. It really is that simple.
Forget URF, I want my Poro King. I looooved that game mode and then they took the RGM away.
yeah for some reason they think nexus blitz is a good enough mode to replace urf, so apparently we wont be getting it this year. imo nexus blitz isn't any better than dominion ever was.
Nope no URF of any kind.
Nexus Blitz is 100000000000x better than URF will ever be.

Nexus Blitz > Rigged URF
I'd rather have something else istead of the rigged urf.
rip real URF.
Funny, last year all I remember is people bitching about Snowdown urf due to the small champion pool and skin locking, but I guess people would rather have it back anyway just too complain about it?

I hate to say it, but i prefer nexus blitz.

It has the chaos and lack of meta of old URF, before it turned into a stale stompfest full of salty kids.
